brand_info.name: McDonald's
brand_info.positioning: The world's leading community-centric food service retailer offering accessible, feel-good moments.
brand_info.vision: To move fast and deliver delicious, feel-good moments to everyone, everywhere.
brand_info.mission: To make delicious feel-good moments easy for everyone.
brand_info.origin_story: Originally founded by Richard and Maurice McDonald in 1940; incorporated by Ray Kroc in 1955 in Des Plaines, Illinois, revolutionizing the franchise model.

brand_values.brand_promise: Consistent quality, convenience, and simple enjoyment regardless of location.

demographics.income_level: Low to High / Value to Premium

psychographics.lifestyle: Busy families, students, workers on-the-go, late-night socializers
psychographics.behavior: Habitual purchasers seeking reliability, speed, and emotional uplift

tone_dos: Focus on the joy of eating

logo.primary_logo: The Golden Arches (Stand-alone or with wordmark)
logo.usage_rules: Arches must remain golden; strict clear space; often cropped in modern minimalist campaigns
logo.lockup_behavior: Flexible; Arches often centered or used as a directional device
logo.safe_area: Proportional to the width of the legs of the Arches

color_system.color_usage_rules: High contrast; Gold used for Arches/Product, Red for backgrounds/accents; White for clean modernity

layout_principles.cta_placement: Prominent, often accompanied by app icons
layout_principles.alignment: Center-focused or grid-based for menu readability

style.camera_feel: Bright, approachable, capturing the 'moment of consumption'
style.pose_guidelines: Natural interactions, genuine smiles, hand-focused product holding

technical.lighting: High-key, warm, natural simulation or popped studio strobe for food
technical.depth_of_field: Shallow for food (macro focus), Deep for lifestyle

product_presentation.styling_approach: Perfect build (melty cheese, condensation on cups, steam)

motion_rules.transitions: Snap zooms, graphic slides matching the Arches geometry

visual_dos: Show the Golden Arches subtly or boldly

digital.tone_adjustment: Meme-centric on Twitter/X, Lifestyle on Instagram, Utility on App

platform_behavior.Instagram: User-generated content reposts, aesthetic food shots

print.paper: Glossy for coupons, Matte for corporate reporting
print.cover_rules: Iconic visual wit (e.g., Arches as fries), minimal text

logo_misuse_examples: changing Arches color to anything but Gold (or White/Black in mono)
